summary: I STARTED THE ENGINE AND SLOWLY DRIVE BECAUSE ITS A DOWNHILL POSITION AND I NOTICE AN ENGINE LIGHT CAME FROM THE DASHBOARD , AND  DECIDED TO STOP BUT IT WON'T STOP. THE CAR KEEP RUNNING AND TRIED TO PRESS THE BRAKE BUT UNFORTUNATELY IT WON'T STOP. UNTIL I DECIDED TO CRASH THE CAR TO THE GATE OF HOUSE IN ORDER TO MAKE THE CAR STOP AND THEN , I SUSTAIN INJURIES, CUTS , BRUISES. I BELIEVE THE ACCIDENT IS CAUSE BY SUDDEN ACCELERATION/ DEFECTIVE PART OF THE VEHICLE. *TR
